name: Jinbe
text: End of Your Turn: If you have 6 cards or less in your hand, set up to 1 of your (Fishman) or (Merfolk) type Character cards and up to 1 DON!! as active.

effect.text: If you have 6 cards or less in your hand, set up to 1 of your (Fishman) or (Merfolk) type Character cards and up to 1 DON!! as active.
